original_title: Shirley Bassey - You Ain't Heard Nothing Yet
overview: In 1985 Dame Shirley Bassey gave a performance to help raise money for the 1986 Commonwealth games that were held in Edinburgh in Scotland. Dame Shirley sang four songs: Nobody does it like me, Arthur's theme, You ain't heard nothing yet and This is my life.
title: Shirley Bassey - You Ain't Heard Nothing Yet
